name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and fresh basil.

name: Classic Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty with melted cheese, lettuce, and tomato.

description: Traditional Italian pasta with eggs, pancetta, and cheese.

description: Crispy golden fries served with ketchup.

description: Rich and fudgy chocolate brownie with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

description: Refreshing cold coffee with ice and milk.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Fresh romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan, and Caesar dressing.
